attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Jane Hodge RESPITE Hotel is the only center for disabled people of all ages 
i went down there with my partner who has MS she i 42 years old she is too young to go in to a nursing home as she is quite active and there is pleanty of things for the guests to do they have various activities for them ie swimming computers the staff are all friendly and careing so please HELP
